headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Moderna Stock Plunges After Resignation of FDA Vaccine Official
raw.summary: The S&P 500 gained 0.6% on Monday, March 31, boosted by an afternoon rally even as investors brace for the planned onset of reciprocal tariffs later this week.

headline: Discover Financial Stock Leads S&P 500 Gainers on Retention of Interim CEO
summary: Discover Financial Services shares surged on word interim CEO J. Michael Shepherd has agreed to stay on through the completion of Capital One Financial's purchase of the credit card provider.

raw.headline: Discover Financial Stock Leads S&P 500 Gainers on Retention of Interim CEO
raw.summary: Discover Financial Services shares surged on word interim CEO J. Michael Shepherd has agreed to stay on through the completion of Capital One Financial's purchase of the credit card provider.

headline: Discover CEO may reap $2.4M bonus
summary: Michael Shepherd will remain as interim chief executive officer potentially through June, and receive a $2.4 million cash bonus if the sale to Capital One closes by then.

raw.headline: Discover CEO may reap $2.4M bonus
raw.summary: Michael Shepherd will remain as interim chief executive officer potentially through June, and receive a $2.4 million cash bonus if the sale to Capital One closes by then.
